aboutClinic.title: About Our Clinic
aboutClinic.subtitle: Multidisciplinary clinics in Moscow and Makhachkala with advanced diagnostics and expert specialists.

doctors.title: Our Doctors
doctors.subtitle:
Our team is more than just experienced specialists.
These are doctors shaping the modern medical landscape — organizing national and international conferences and seminars, publishing scientific papers, developing clinical guidelines and educational programs.
By working in an interdisciplinary format and combining expertise across fields, we create accessible and effective algorithms even for the most complex clinical cases.
We don’t compete — we build a professional community where knowledge, experience, and collaboration work for the benefit of the patient.

doctor1.name: Subramanian Somasundaram (Dr. Soma)
doctor1.desc:
A doctor who takes on the most complex cases. Dr. Soma is not only a brilliant surgeon specializing in head and neck tumors but also the founder of the Eurasian Oncology Program (EAFO), which brings together doctors from different countries to exchange experience. In the operating room, he is precise; in conversation — open; in life — inspiring.
• Oncologist, surgeon, maxillofacial surgeon, ENT specialist, plastic surgeon
• Specialization: tumors of the head and neck, skin, thyroid and breast, lymph node dissection, oncoplasty
• President and founder of the Scientific and Educational Center "Eurasian Oncology Program" (EAFO)
• Head of reconstructive and oncoplastic surgery projects

doctor2.name: Hasanbekova Zarema Medzhidovna
doctor2.desc:
A specialist with whom it’s easy to discuss even the most delicate topics. Zarema Medzhidovna helps women cope with gynecological and mammological problems, combining evidence-based medicine with genuine care and empathy. Her goal is not only to heal but to preserve quality of life.
• PhD in Medicine, Oncogynecologist, Mammologist
• Senior Research Fellow at EAFO Scientific and Educational Center
• Specialization: cervical, ovarian, and breast diseases, aesthetic gynecology
• Participant in educational and scientific projects in oncogynecology

doctor3.name: Nechushkina Valentina Mikhailovna
doctor3.desc:
Experience, strength, and science — all describe Valentina Mikhailovna. She performs complex surgeries, teaches, and leads oncogynecology projects at EAFO. Her style: precision, thoughtfulness, and mastery. With her, patients know they’re in safe hands.
• Doctor of Medical Sciences, Professor, Oncogynecologist
• Head of the Eurasian Working Group on Oncogynecology
• Specialization: cervical and ovarian cancer, HIPEC, cytoreduction
• Expert and lecturer at PIMU, scientific leader at EAFO

doctor4.name: Kondratyeva Tatyana Tikhonovna
doctor4.desc:
A specialist whose diagnosis determines the course of treatment — a doctor who sees what others cannot.
• Doctor of Medical Sciences, Pathologist
• Head of the diagnostic service “Pathologica Service” and expert of EAFO oncopathology program
• Chief Research Fellow at EAFO Scientific and Educational Center
• Specialization: tumors, blood and lymphoid system diseases
• Expert in complex diagnostic cases
Doctor of Medical Sciences, highest-category pathologist.
Head of Pathologica Service, Chief Research Fellow at the EAFO Scientific and Educational Center, and Head of the EAFO Oncopathology Program.
Specializes in morphological diagnosis of benign and malignant neoplasms, as well as blood and lymphoid diseases.

doctor5.name: Mozhenkova Anna Vasilievna
doctor5.desc:
Anna Vasilievna is an expert in one of the most intricate fields — laboratory diagnostics of hematological and oncological diseases. She deciphers complex analyses and helps 'see' disease under the microscope. Her work often becomes the key to the right decision.
• PhD in Medicine, Laboratory Diagnostics Specialist
• Specialization: immunomorphology, cytology, bone marrow
• Participant in international medical consiliums
• Focus: diagnosis of lymphomas, leukemias, and rare tumors

doctor6.name: Sinitsyna Marina Evgenievna
doctor6.desc:
A specialist who helps 'see' disease first. Her ultrasound examinations are precise, timely, and invaluable in early diagnostics — helping determine the extent of disease.
• PhD in Medicine, Ultrasound Specialist
• Specialization: vessels, abdominal organs, thyroid gland, genitourinary system
• Active participant in multidisciplinary consiliums

doctor7.name: Popova Ekaterina Yuryevna
doctor7.desc:
A young specialist who already thinks and acts like a doctor of the future. Studying in the USA, overcoming high competition, and being awarded the Presidential Scholarship all reflect her ambition to become a strong clinician. Ekaterina Yuryevna trains in a major U.S. healthcare system, adopting global best practices while maintaining a genuine passion for patient care.
• Neurologist
• Presidential Scholar 2021–2022
• Resident, Neurology Program, University of Texas Medical Branch, Galveston
• Research interests: neuro-oncology, interdisciplinary diagnostics, neurological rehabilitation

doctor8.name: Sidorova Elizaveta Ivanovna
doctor8.desc:
A thoughtful, multidisciplinary specialist combining clinical practice, research, and work in one of the country’s leading surgical centers. She treats, studies, and supports patients with severe liver pathology at the forefront of transplant medicine.
• Therapist, Gastroenterologist
• 9 years of experience
• Specialization: liver diseases, pre- and post-transplant management

doctor9.name: Sankaranarayanan Arumugam Saravanan (Dr. Sas)
doctor9.desc:
A doctor confidently handling both post-traumatic cases and musculoskeletal oncology. He develops personalized treatment plans, selects prostheses, and takes an active role in patient rehabilitation — restoring mobility and quality of life.
• Orthopedic Traumatologist, Oncologist, PhD in Medicine
• Specialization: arthritis treatment, joint replacement, bone tumor diagnostics and treatment, deformity correction, trauma surgery
• Expert in personalized rehabilitation plans
• Member of a multidisciplinary onco-orthopedic team

doctor10.name: Streltsova Olga Nikolaevna
doctor10.desc:
A doctor you turn to when accuracy matters most. A specialist who not only interprets images but understands their clinical context.
• Oncologist, Radiologist, PhD in Medicine
• 22 years of experience
• Specialization: X-ray, mammography, CT, MRI, second opinions, complex case review
• Participant in oncological consiliums, expert in advanced imaging

doctor11.name: Glotov Mikhail Nikolaevich
doctor11.desc:
An attentive and meticulous doctor who treats every patient not as a case, but as a person deserving individual attention and care.
Mikhail Nikolaevich doesn’t just diagnose — he finds the essence of the problem and solutions where others see contradictions.
Patients appreciate his systematic approach, precision, and ability to explain complex things clearly.
• Cardiologist, Therapist, Hepatologist, Family Doctor
• PhD in Medicine
• 40 years of experience
• Specialization: diagnostics and treatment of internal diseases, ENT pathologies, cardiovascular, respiratory, and digestive disorders
• Experience in CIS and European countries
• Consultant for oncological consiliums on supportive therapy and complications

doctor12.name: Alyoshina Olga Alexandrovna
doctor12.desc:
An experienced hematologist and department head focused on a personalized approach and advanced methods of cellular and immune therapy.
Olga Alexandrovna not only manages her department — she sets standards for the treatment of acute leukemias and malignant lymphomas, participates in international studies, and applies targeted and immunotherapy based on cutting-edge science.
• Hematologist, Oncologist
• PhD in Medicine
• Head of the Department of Cellular and Immune Therapy, National Medical Research Center of Hematology, Ministry of Health of Russia
• 15 years of experience
• Specialization: acute leukemias, aggressive lymphomas, immune and targeted therapy, clinical protocol development

doctor13.name: Prikhodchenko Alexey Olegovich
doctor13.desc:
A doctor with over 10 years of experience specializing in intensive care for oncology patients after complex surgeries. Alexey Olegovich combines deep clinical knowledge with a scientific approach, enabling him to provide high-quality perioperative care.
• Anesthesiologist-Resuscitator
• PhD in Medicine
• 10 years of experience
• Head of Anesthesiology and Intensive Care at 'Health-Direct' Medical Center
• Member of the Russian Society of Clinical Oncology (RUSSCO)
• Member of the National Association of Specialists in Thrombosis and Hemostasis (NATG)
• Member of the Russian Association of Supportive Care in Oncology (RASSC)

doctor14.name: Snegovoy Anton Vladimirovich
doctor14.desc:
An experienced oncologist-chemotherapist who applies modern methods of treating malignant tumors, considering the individual characteristics of each patient.
Anton Vladimirovich is actively engaged in research, serves as the Chairman of the Russian Association of Supportive Care in Oncology (RASSC), and is the author of numerous scientific publications.
• Oncologist, Chemotherapist
• Professor, Doctor of Medical Sciences
• Specialization: chemotherapy for various cancers, supportive therapy, personalized treatment
• Participant in international oncology consiliums
• Head of the Department of Drug Treatment of Tumors, N.A. Lopatkin Research Institute of Urology and Interventional Radiology

doctor15.name: Kurnosov Ivan Alexandrovich
doctor15.desc:
A leading neurosurgeon and oncologist for whom every operation is a carefully designed plan with maximum attention to detail. Each of his surgeries integrates science, experience, and deep compassion for the patient.
Ivan Alexandrovich combines advanced neurosurgical techniques with personalized assessment to ensure not only successful treatment but also safe recovery.
• Neurosurgeon, Oncologist
• PhD in Medicine
• Head of the Department of Neuro-Oncology, N.N. Petrov National Medical Research Center of Oncology
• 9 years of experience
• Specialization: diagnosis and treatment of oncological diseases of the central and peripheral nervous system, skull base tumors, and spinal disorders

doctor16.name: Kononenko Inessa Borisovna
doctor16.desc:
For over 25 years, Inessa Borisovna has been developing and implementing personalized chemo- and immunotherapy regimens, emphasizing both effectiveness and treatment tolerability.
Her approach is never random — each therapeutic strategy is built considering the tumor’s molecular features, comorbidities, and patient’s real quality of life.
Patients value her thoughtful approach, clear explanations, and constant support throughout treatment.
• Oncologist, Chemotherapist
• PhD in Medicine
• Highest qualification category
• 25 years of experience
• Specialization: cancer drug therapy, supportive care, immunotherapy, and targeted therapy
• Executive Director of the Russian Association of Supportive Care in Oncology (RASSC)
• Member of the European Society for Medical Oncology (ESMO) and the Russian Society of Clinical Oncology (RUSSCO)

doctor17.name: Timashkov Ivan Alexandrovich
doctor17.desc:
A specialist whose accuracy determines the right diagnosis. Works with all types of radiological imaging — from joint CT scans to chest and pelvic studies. Helps detect what others might miss. Has extensive experience participating in oncology consiliums.
• Radiologist
• Specialization: X-ray and CT diagnostics of abdominal, ENT, musculoskeletal, gastrointestinal, thoracic, pelvic, spinal, and joint systems
• Experience in oncology and general medical institutions

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: A full range of medical services using advanced technologies and international quality standards

s1.title: Specialist consultation
s1.desc: Get direct access to top medical experts who will carefully review your case and guide you toward the best treatment options. Every consultation is personalized, ensuring your concerns are heard and your care plan is tailored specifically to you.

s2.title: Individual Early diagnosis of Diseases
s2.desc: Stay ahead of illness with advanced check-ups designed to detect health problems at the very earliest stage — when they’re easiest to treat. Our goal is to give you peace of mind through proactive, precise health screening.

s3.title: International Multispecialty Expert Telemedicine Consultation (IMETC)
s3.desc: Our specialists analyze tissue samples with the highest precision to ensure your diagnosis is accurate and reliable. This detailed examination helps doctors create the most effective treatment plan for you.

s4.title: Chemotherapy
s4.desc: A team of leading experts works together to study your cancer at the genetic level, creating a treatment plan that is truly personalized.

s5.title: Installation of a venous port system for Chemotherapy
s5.desc: Your case is reviewed by world-class oncologists from around the globe, giving you access to international expertise without leaving home. This ensures you benefit from the latest knowledge and treatment approaches worldwide.

s6.title: CT Scan
s6.desc: A second opinion you can trust — our radiology experts re-examine your scans to confirm results and provide accurate, reliable insights for your treatment plan. Every image is carefully analyzed to ensure nothing is overlooked in your diagnosis.

s7.title: Pathomorphological studies at PathoLogica Service
s7.desc: Cutting-edge imaging that not only shows the structure of organs but also reveals how they function — crucial for early and accurate cancer detection. This technology helps your doctors monitor treatment progress with unparalleled precision.

s8.title: Digital diagnosis of skin tumors (Dermatoscopy using artificial intelligence)
s8.desc: We offer the latest in cancer treatment: chemotherapy, targeted therapy, and immunotherapy — all tailored to your unique diagnosis.

s9.title: Molecular consultation
s9.desc: Our surgeons use advanced techniques to remove tumors safely and effectively, focusing on both cure and quality of life. We combine skill and care to ensure recovery is as smooth and comfortable as possible.

s10.title: Expert review of CT, MRI, PET-CT
s10.desc: From your first visit to every step of treatment, our team is by your side to support, guide, and care for you. We provide continuous attention so you never feel alone on your health journey.

s11.title: Medical Assistance
s11.desc: State-of-the-art radiation technology that targets tumors with precision, protecting healthy tissue while fighting cancer. Our specialists design treatments that are effective yet gentle, helping you maintain your quality of life.

s12.title: Voluntary Follow-up
s12.desc: Expert care for bones, joints, and the musculoskeletal system — whether you’ve suffered an injury or need long-term orthopedic treatment. We use modern surgical and non-surgical methods to restore mobility and reduce pain.

patientMap.title: We Help Patients from All Over the World
patientMap.subtitle: International telemedicine consultations and treatment for patients from more than 50 countries worldwide

membership.title: Premium Medical Care
membership.subtitle: An exclusive membership program for those who value quality healthcare and a personalized approach

feature1.title: Priority Booking
feature1.desc: Appointment with the desired specialist or surgery at convenient times

feature2.title: Discounts on Examinations
feature2.desc: Up to 20% off on diagnostic procedures and check-ups

feature3.title: Personal Coordinator
feature3.desc: Dedicated assistant to handle all medical matters

feature4.title: Annual Check-up
feature4.desc: Comprehensive medical examination once a year

feature6.title: Electronic Medical Record
feature6.desc: Unlimited access to your personal electronic record 24/7

membership.contactText: Or contact us for a personalized consultation

faq1.question: How does priority booking work?
faq1.answer: HDMC+ members can book appointments with the desired doctor with reduced waiting time and can also schedule emergency visits if new complaints or symptoms arise.

faq2.question: What do IMETC consultations include?
faq2.answer: IMETC consultations provide the opportunity to receive remote expert opinions from international specialists regarding your medical case.

faq3.question: Can membership be paused?
faq3.answer: Yes, membership can be paused for up to 6 months while retaining all benefits for the remaining period.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us in any convenient way. We work for your health and are ready to answer all your questions.

feedback.title: Unified HDMC Hotline
feedback.subtitle: You can leave feedback about a doctor, file a complaint about service quality, or report fraud or corruption.

box1.title: Leave a Thank You
box1.point1: If you are completely satisfied with the quality of medical or other services provided by the Medsi Group, you can leave positive feedback about our work.
box1.point2: To express your gratitude, please use the feedback form.

box2.title: Submit a Complaint
box2.point1: If you are dissatisfied with the quality of medical or other services provided by the Medsi Group, you can write to us about it.
box2.point2: Use the feedback form to file a complaint about poor service received at the Medsi Group.

box3.title: Anti-Corruption
box3.point1: If you notice any unlawful, fraudulent, or corrupt actions by Medsi Group employees, please report it.
box3.point2: Use the feedback form to report violations during procurement procedures or actions of suppliers/contractors.

box4.title: Suggestion
box4.point1: If you have suggestions for improving service, opening a new clinic near your home, etc., please send them to us.
box4.point2: Use the feedback form to submit your business proposal.

descText: One of the tools for maintaining business ethics standards is the 'Unified Hotline.' This communication channel aims to enhance the Medsi Group’s efforts in combating potential misconduct, fraud, corruption, violations, and shortcomings.

If you did not find a suitable form, you can send your inquiry to the email address claim@medsigroup.ru. The request will be reviewed within 30 days. To process the request, please include your contact details (full name, date of birth, and phone number). Requests submitted without contact details will not be reviewed.

All messages are recorded by an authorized Medsi Group employee for further analysis and verification. The confidentiality of message senders is guaranteed. Reports on the operation of the 'Unified Hotline' and the results of investigations are submitted to the President of the Medsi Group for appropriate action.

form.heading: Feedback Form
form.agree: I agree to the terms of the Personal Data Processing Policy and give my consent to the processing of my personal data.
